Description: A cool rare guitar with Hardshell case in excellent condition. See photos and do your own research on this ultra rare guitar before you buy it. Details from MF store:  limited edition Schecter guitar with cool looks and tone to match your rock vibe. The Schecter C-1 Limited electric guitar features a beautifully quilted m@ple top and mahogany body, and a 3-piece mahogany neck. The eb0ny fingerboard is adorned with awesome mother-of-pearl split crown inlays. Schecter's Ultra Access neck joint lets you comfortably reach all 24 extra-jumbo frets. Grover tuners and a TonePros Tune-O-Matic bridge with thru-body string design add to the stability and tonal sustain of this shredder's delight. Chrome hardware and abalone body binding highlight this eye-catching instrument. The Schecter C-1 limited will be a production run of only 50 sold in the USA.  The Schecter C-1 Limited's electronics deliver the tone and power you're after. An EMG 81X active humbucker provides increased headroom giving the voicing an organic and open tone while still maintaining the clarity and response that EMG's are renowned for. Utilizing powerful ceramic magnets and close aperture coils and powered by a newly designed preamp, the 81X shines with detailed intensity, incredible amounts of high end cut and fluid sustain. Traditionally used in the bridge position, this pickup will make your leads slice right through even the densest mix like a hot knife. The EMG 85X humbucking pickup in the neck position featuring close aperture coils loaded with Alnico V magnets and powered by a newly designed preamp, the 85X is a powerful pickup with exceptional tone and versatility across the spectrum. The Alnico magnets give a warm growl and velvet lead tones that enable you to play the deepest of blues to the most extreme metal. FEATURES Body Style: Double-cutaway C style Construction: Set-neck with Ultra Access neck joint Body: Mahogny Top: Quilted maple Neck: 3-piece mahogany Scale length: 25.5" Fingerboard: Eb0ny Frets: 24 extra-jumbo Fingerboard inlays: Mother-of-Pearl Split Crown Nut: Graph Tech Tusq Binding: Abalone Pickups: EMG 81X, EMG 85X active humbuckers Electronics: 2 Volumel, 1 tone, 3-way toggle Selector Bridge: TonePros Tune-o-matic-style with a string-thru design Tuners: Grover Hardware: chrome The guitar has very little play wear. Some wear on back. Needs fretboard cleaned and new strings from sitting unplayed for years! Sold as is no returns no exchanges no refunds no partial refunds. This is a great guitar don't miss out on this opportunity!
Title: RARE Schecter C-1 LIMITED Electric Guitar EMG NeckThru Korea ONLY 50 SOLD IN USA
